185750709.review: L'ho trovato piacevole anche a diversi anni dalla sua uscita. A mio parere migliore del primo.

185743863.review:
I really like this game, it feels like a natural evolution of the first game. It has a lot more details, more complex puzzles and now has somewhat of a story going on. So the production is much better and the game has an ending of sorts. The only downside is that the game focuses sometimes on a little more specific solutions for the puzzles. They are still intuitive and you don't have to use a guide if you are patient enough, but it makes me question what kind of game the 3rd one will be. 
The main reason I didn't enjoy this one as much as the 1st is the loss of novelty, mostly due to you not being able to fail a puzzle. You can simply keep clicking on things until the game gives you a hint or you stumble onto something that can progress the game.
In the 1st game you could solve parts of different parallel puzzles most of the time, but this game lacks that.

185731529.review: A solid successor to The Room

The Room Two takes the brilliant puzzle-box concept of the original and explodes it into multiple atmospheric environments. More rooms, deeper mysteries, and seriously spine-tingling moments.

Why It’s Awesome:
• Expanded gameplay beyond a single box
• Creepier, more immersive storytelling
• Ingenious supernatural puzzles

Rating: 5/5. A must-play for puzzle lovers who enjoy a dash of supernatural intrigue!

185166379.review:
추천이냐 비추냐 하면 추천이긴한데, 1편처럼 퍼즐위주로 풀어나가는게 아니라 퍼즐 자체를 꽁꽁 숨겨두고 숨은퍼즐찾기 시키는 방식으로 바껴서 개인적으로는 꽤 불호.

특히 상호작용 할 수 있는 건 많은데 아이템 하나 주어지지 않은 처음 상태에서 뭘 해야하는지 전혀 알 수 없는 경우가 많음.
막힐 경우 힌트 보면 되는데 꼭 첫번째 힌트는 나도 아는 사실을 이야기해서 두번째까지 기다리게 만드는 것도 개열받음.

무언가를 할  수 있어!, 이 아이템을 어딘가에 쓸 수 있지 않을까? ← 나도 안다고 ㅅㅂ 그걸 어디다가 써야되는지를 모르는거지.

여전히 정교하게 맞물리는 퍼즐의 정밀기계 같은 연출은 마음을 사로잡는 무언가가 있고, 이번에는 호러 연출도 꽤 들어간 편인데 
 꽤 오싹해서 좋았음.

다만 스토리랑 엔딩은 전편처럼 아리송함..

185091160.review: See my review of the series under the first one: The Room. I recommend the whole series for any puzzle fan. Great Graphics and interesting puzzles and the puzzles do require memory or writing things down since some parts are for other areas. Especially in the 4th one.

185081192.review: nette Grafik und klasse Rätsel, von leicht bis schwer alles dabei.

185075096.review:
I liked this more than the first game, and it definitely has more production value. While there isn't much story, you might as well play the first though because it's a "this happens, then this", and this game definitely adds more story to the mix than the first one (which still had some via beginning and ending cutscenes and notes).

The puzzles are confusing at points, but overall they're pretty exciting to solve, with a bit of crunchy sound design and visuals as the objects and world shift around in response.

You'll be getting this puzzle game so cheap with it's sales, that there isn't much complaining about it only being a few hours, I played with my boyfriend so it gave us both a good 2-3 nights of fumbling around in it. (he's cute)

Unless you're very against puzzle games, this is a solid title and probably one of my favorite dedicated games in said genre.

My bf: "It really was cool, I actually liked it"

185041587.review:
Knifflige Rätsel in einer mysteriösen Umgebung.    >>>TOP<<<
Sehr zu empfehlen

185041112.review:
The Room Two expands on the brilliance of its predecessor with even more elaborate puzzles and diverse environments. The game seamlessly transitions between rooms, offering a greater variety of challenges while maintaining the tactile, hands-on mechanics that make it so immersive. The atmospheric visuals and haunting soundtrack pull you deeper into its cryptic narrative, making every solved puzzle feel like a triumph. While it’s still relatively short, the layered complexity and polished design make it a must-play for puzzle enthusiasts.

Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

 I got this on sale, but I would have willingly paid full price or even more for this game. The puzzles are of perfect difficulty for me, and they all connect very nicely. 184829543.review: one of the greatest puzzle games,,,  WELL DONE for independent developers!!!!!!

184825938.review:
The Room Two starts off great, with an intriguing first couple of chapters and a clear improvement in production value and scale compared to the first game. Around chapter 3 however, the whole ordeal started feeling stale and repetitive. It doesn't help that the story, which started out quite clear and mysterious, ends up going anywhere and nowhere at the same time. Puzzles where you actually had to think or do something unexpected became increasingly rare. Once you realize that most of your time is spent just scanning an area for intractable stuff and moving objects from A to B, the magic quickly fades.

I was initially quite enthusiastic about this game, but now I am unsure if I want to continue the series, even at the low price point it is often sold for during sales.

184785769.review: A quality improvement from the first, very enjoyable

184772370.review:
[h1] Surpreendentemente bom!!! [/h1]

A franquia The Room possui ao todo 4 jogos (para PC e mobile) além de um jogo VR, e todos são surpreendentemente bons! Os jogos giram em torno da resolução de puzzles, muitas das vezes através de puzzles boxes (muito bem feitas e criativas por sinal) dentre outros quebra-cabeças. Ambos os jogos possuem boa variedade de puzzles, boa trilha sonora e uma história de fundo intrigante/interessante que te instigam a continuar. A duração dos jogos vai de 2,5 à 5 horas dependendo do jogo e da sua velocidade de resolução dos quebra-cabeças; o que torna a experiência agradável e não a torna maçante. Vale a pena demais, especialmente quando em promoção. Recomendo toda a série!

184765725.review: j'ai joué au 1 puis à celui la et je compte bien faire le 3 et le 4 et la version vr, car ils sont trop bien ^^

Das Drücken-und-Ziehen-Gimmick, das es schon im ersten Teil gab, wurde mit der Zeit anstrengend, da es sich nicht immer so steuern ließ, wie man es wollte. Trotzdem kann ich das Spiel empfehlen :D

184418101.review:
相比第一部围绕一个箱子的解谜，第二部是在场景里解谜，更复杂，更分散了一些。但是不会卡关，提示不会直接告诉你答案，所以不会毁了成功破解谜题的成就感。

尤其喜欢这个剧情，每个房间都有其对应人物的剧情。而且剧情的叙述不是长篇大论，而是通过一些小细节，书信，报纸，实验报告等等讲述的，如果玩家好奇的话就可以从这些细节中还原人物关系和背景故事。

但这一部有些时候还蛮吓人的的，有点克系。尤其是音效，我每次开机关的时候都会被吓一下...所以时时刻刻都保持警惕...

184392486.review: Just as good if not better than the first one. I've been playing these 1-4 on to three to see what's in store

184391809.review: Point and click (and drag) puzzles, for relaxing gaming in a soothing occult atmosphere.

184294422.review: I have not finished the game, and I am not enjoying it as much as the first room game. It is frustrating when you don't click something just right or put it in the exact spot...I was trying to load a crossbow bolt forever, not know exactly what part of the crossbow I should be attempting to put it. Anyway, the main reason I want to comment is to WARN THOSE SENSITIVE TO FLASHING LIGHTS. There is some of that in every chapter so far, and I think I just finished the third. I don't have that sensitivity, and even for me it is over the top. I don't see an option to turn that off. Just an FYI for those with that sensitivity, I would NOT purchase this game.

Sometimes I know what I need to do and it won't let me. Then I check the clue and it is exactly what I want to do, then suddenly what I wanted to do works.

184176240.review: Great atmospheric puzzle game. I think I enjoyed the first one more but this one leans a little into spooky territory and it was still great fun. Doesn't have the same mobile to pc issues that the first game seemingly did.

184148879.review: Juegazo de inteligencia, varias horas de diversión y puzzles, perfecto para todo el mundo, una inmejorable compra!!!

184136858.review:
They did it again! 

Another truly fantastic and very addictive game by Fireproof Game. 

After the great “The Room” I approached this sequel with the question “Will I enjoy this game as the first one?” and the answer is “Oh yes, it did it!”  

Once you start the first chapter it will be very difficult to stop until the sixth. 

Now I’m ready for The Room Three :-)

184120004.review: fun to play with only a few times I got stuck

184119773.review: This is a fun puzzle game that is not to hard but not to easy. Overall the game was very fun.

184104286.review: Absolutely amazing game! It was a little bit more confusing than the first one because of all the different areas you could interact with, but the hints help just fine.

184087143.review: Sehr kniffelig aber lösbar. Toller und spannender Zeitvertreib. Teilweise ist es mir zu dunkel, aber es soll wohl etwas spuki sein. Ich kann das Spiel nur weiterempfehlen.

183986561.review: Really enjoyable puzzles and story, well hidden and keeps you guessing, I liked the multiple interactave puzzles in the room, looking forward to playing the next game, just wishing the games took a bit longer than 3 hours to complete.

183960875.review:
Es otro titulo similar al The Room 1, haces un poco menos de uso del Monoculo para ver cosas y las pistas que te dan son algo menos necesarias, asimismo dejas de tocar maquinas estaticas y tenes algo mas de interaccion con el ambiente caminando y tocando cosas en distintos puzzles.

Es un juego algo diferente pero me gusta la variacion en relacion al otro tiulo, igual que el primero tiene logros, cloud y CROMOS que ayudan a darle mas valor al titulo.

9/10 - Muy bueno, Duracion algo mas breve que el primer titulo - Si te gustan los puzzles compralo.

183957805.review: Love escape room games, and the room series really scratches that itch for me. While I dont really  understand the storyline, the puzzles propel me through from one room to another. Its a really great deal given the steam sale right now.

183951913.review: Jogo muito bom para quem gosta do gênero. Além disso, os gráficos são bem bonitos, e a história por trás é interessante também.

183948307.review: I think that this was a worthy sequel to the original game. The visuals and music are still solid, though nothing particularly special. The puzzles themselves, however, have improved. Instead of just a new set of puzzle boxes, they created entire rooms filled with many puzzles and multiple puzzle boxes per room. Additionally, there is a good amount of interactions between the different puzzles and puzzle boxes within each room. The story and mysteries of the first game have also been continued and expanded from the first game. There are both returning characters and new characters that all have different amounts of knowledge and stakes in the mysteries of these games' universe. It was really awesome to see. Like the first game, though, the game feels a little short. While the puzzles are really cool, they are nothing too difficult, and the length of the game is about the same as the first game. I would love to see them really expand the length of the games and the puzzles within them in future games. But for what is here, the game is really good, and expands upon the original in nearly all the ways one would hope for.

183945544.review: Jogo muito bom com otimmos puzzles, vale a pena pra quem curte o genero

183904365.review: One of the best, if not the best, series of escape room games out there. The sound effects are super satisfying, the puzzles are tricky without feeling frustrating, and the overall quality of the graphics/design is just superb. Once I started the game I couldn't stop until it was over. On to the next one!

183904092.review:
This game wonderfully captures the atmosphere of Lovecraftian horror, slowly building the tension and leaving the extreme unrealness to the very end.
I like the little bits of lore scattered in each level and I kinda wish there were more of them

183901299.review: Muito divertido, esse teve enigmas bem mais desafiadores pra se resolver... E uma aprofundação interessante da historia por trás dele. Muito bom mesmo, recomendo de verdade!

183869724.review: 单拎出来很好很精致，但是相比第一部感觉差很多，一方面是画面音效咋咋呼呼，但其实又没什么太恐怖的东西，感觉跟罐头笑声似的有点尴尬；另一方面是场景太大了，关卡内好几个平台之间联动频繁，本来这倒不算问题，问题是很多谜题之间没什么承接性，纯靠眼力在好几个平台乱找，面对大量设施经常会手足无措，在搭建光路那关尤其明显；最后是感觉一些解谜有点没活了，塔罗牌那关反复打字-放牌没意思不说，最后放相片那个柜子打开竟然是靠震碎玻璃，人在无语时真的会笑出来，早震碎不就不用解密了。。。

183857279.review: KOM NU med det room 5 pls

183842006.review: I like this game. The puzzles are not that hard if you follow the hints when you are stuck. I also like that there is a story behind it. I also don't get why this game (games) are so cheap for what you get. I think the price for this game could be higher.

183796535.review: O primeiro é melhor que o segundo!

183792551.review: A decent puzzler, however its design tends to make some puzzles far more ambiguous than they should be (if you are not using hints). Spending 30 minutes clicking everything in a room only to find that the solution was something trivial gets moderately tedious after a while and replaces the feeling of accomplishment usually adjacent to puzzle games with frustration. Hopefully the next few games add some riddles or other elements to make the puzzles more satisfying.

183763872.review: 这部终于有些The Room的样子，不过互动只有房间里的，仍待改善。
